The problem was caused by the required bundle missing from the org.apache.axis and org.apache.wsil4j plugin.  Since these plugins contains JARs that depends on other plugins, compile errors would not show up if the required bundle was removed from the manifest file.

Also, for the org.apache.axis plugin, we should only be exporting the packages from the axis.jar and axis-ant.jar.  Those are the only JARs other plugins should depend on.  The other JARs are:

commons-discover-0.2
commons-logging-1.0.4
jaxrpc
log4j-1.2.8
saaj
wsdl4j-1.5.1

They are only used by the axis.jar and axis-ant.jar.  They should not be exported because we don't want to cause class loader issues because multiple plugins are contributing those files.

The changes to the manifest file to org.apache.axis and org.apache.wsil4j have been committed to head and released as v200603092046.
Verified as fixed in WTP 1.5 I20060309_2313 build.
